name: craft-quick-notes
title: Craft Quick Notes
description: Quickly add notes and tasks to Craft daily notes
author: moritz_rubner

commands.name: add-note
commands.title: Add Note
commands.description: Add a note to today's or tomorrow's daily note

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Add Task
commands.description: Add a task to today, tomorrow, or inbox

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: API key for authenticated endpoints (optional for some links)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
